title: Issues with Unified Inbox visual
creator: matthias.scheid2
content: The issue only occurs within the unified inbox. When accessing the inbox of an individual account directly, the problem does not exist. Example: When I am in the unified inbox overview and all emails are unread, I open one of them and then click the back arrow. All emails still appear as unread (bold). The status only changes from bold to normal once I start scrolling. Furthermore, if I open an email and delete it from within the message view, I am automatically redirected to the overview, but the deleted email still appears there. If I click on it again, nothing happens (as it has already been deleted). Again, the email only disappears from the list once I click elsewhere or scroll. This makes the unified inbox unusable for me at the moment, as I have to manually click through each individual account. Has this bug already been reported?"
